snippet.title: Trainz Simulator 12
snippet.description:
Build and operate the railroad of your dreams by yourself or with your friends.

Trainz simulator 12 includes the most exciting new feature in the history of Trainz. The players have been asking for it, and we have delivered, introducing Trainz Multiplayer! Now players from all over the world can build, play and operate railroads together.

Discover the realism, flexibility, and capability you expect from the best train simulator on the market. With 8 new classic and exotic routes available, including a brand new Municipal Transit Railway with streetcars and elevated commuter rail, incredibly detailed routes set in modern era Russia, Hungary, and more!
